text: Jerry Jeff Walker (born Ronald Clyde Crosby; March 16, 1942 - October 23, 2020) was an American country music singer-songwriter and guitarist. He was born in Oneonta, New York. He was best known for his single "Mr. Bojangles", released in 1968. Walker died on October 23, 2020 from throat cancer-related problems in Austin, Texas at the age of 78."Country & Songwriting Legend Jerry Jeff Walker Has Died", Saving Country Music, October 23, 2020. title: Jerry Jeff Walker
